author: adityapatwardhan
body:
PackageManagement should be added as a dependency to Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK

Steps to reproduce
------------------
NA

Expected behavior
-----------------

PackageManagement should be a dependency.

Actual behavior
---------------

PackageManagement is missing as a dependency.

Environment data
----------------

NA

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@bmanikm 
PackageManagement NuGet should be available on NuGet.org to add this dependency.

comments.author: bmanikm
comments.body: @jianyunt @alerickson please publish the PackageManagement NuGet packages to NuGet.org.

title: Add PackageManagement nuget package as a depedency to Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK nuget package
